kjv_def: be in health, (be safe and) sound, (be) whole(-some)
strongs_def: to have sound health, i.e. be well (in body); figuratively, to be uncorrupt (true in doctrine)
outline:
1. to be sound, to be well, to be in good health
  2. metaph.
    1. of Christians whose opinions are free from any mixture of error
    2. of one who keeps the graces and is strong
